name: Gloopy Knight
description:
Will you gloop? (Try full-screen)

Gloopy Knight flies, avoid obstacles and smash if you have hammer.

You start with 3 hammers.

::Hammers::
You get a new hammer each 5 points...
Then each 10 points.
After 50 points its get harder to get hammers

::Diamond Medal::
Diamond medal at 250 pts
